text: The 2019 Roller Hockey African Championship was the first edition of this tournament, played in Angola between 8 and 10 March 2019. This tournament was played independently served as qualifier for the 2019 Roller Hockey World Cup, by giving only one place to the World Cup and two more for the Intercontinental Cup, second tier. Angola conquered the first edition, contested by only three teams due to the refusal of South Africa. ==Standings== ==References== ==External links== *World Skate Roller hockey Category:Roller hockey competitions African Roller Hockey Championship, 2019 Category:2019 in African sport Category:International roller hockey competitions hosted by Angola
title: 2019 Roller Hockey African Championship
